/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The roads are teeming with vehicles, including cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The trees lining the roads are lush and green, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the roads.
